import React from 'react' import {Navbar, Nav, Container, Badge } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import { FaCartArrowDown,FaUser} from 'react-icons/fa6'; import { useSelector, UseSelector } from 'react-redux/es/hooks/useSelector'; import logo from '../assets/Afriqana-logo.jpg'; const Header = () => { const { cartItems } = useSelector((state) => state.cart); return (
Order Member Catering Cart { cartItems.length > 0 && ( { cartItems.reduce((a, c) => a + c.qty, 0) } ) } Sign In
) } export default Header
